entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 04:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
